org.lwjgl.opencl

Class CLBusAddressAMD

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.opencl.CLBusAddressAMD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class CLBusAddressAMD
extends Struct
    Bus address information used in AMDBusAddressableMemory.clEnqueueMakeBuffersResidentAMD(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, org.lwjgl.opencl.CLBusAddressAMD.Buffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer).

    cl_bus_address_amd members

    MemberTypeDescription
    surfbusaddresscl_longcontains the page aligned physical starting address of the backing store preallocated by the application on a remote device
    signalbusaddresscl_longcontains the page aligned physical starting address of preallocated signaling surface

      • CLBusAddressAMD

      • CLBusAddressAMD

        public CLBusAddressAMD(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a CLBusAddressAMD instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
